website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for being reasonably durable and including a nozzle with nine patterns. However, it also comes with a few quirks typical for hoses in its class.
pros: Has a reasonably tough construction that does a fairly good job resisting punctures
Exterior material is coated with a non-slip rubberized finish for an easy grip
Includes brass connectors and a 9-pattern nozzle
cons: Doesn't always expand to the full 50-foot length
Not as flexible as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Just what we hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: This compact, lightweight hose is well-made and should last a very long time. Painters and lawn people had mistreated the original old style hose. This hose fits in a small container, gives a nice, strong spray, and is easily handled by an 85 year-old woman (me).
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: Really handy tool
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this garden hose. If you need it, I highly recommend you just buy it. Not only is good quality, is also cheap price. This water pipe-line is long enough, and very light stretchy. We use it to clean our car and sprinkle the flowers and lawn, and it’s really handy tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jiu

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This hose measures under 25 feet. It does elongate but “up to 50 feet” is a total lie. It’s more like 30 feet if you pull hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT 50 ft long!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 50 foot hose because I needed a 50 foot hose ASAP. I received my order for a 50 foot hose and still don't have a 50 foot hose, not even close, even when fully stretched. I spent a lot of time combing through garden hoses to get a quality product for my money so this is really frustrating and disappointing. I can't even get close to the location where I need to use the water, so it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: littlelotus

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold up and now I can’t return it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Well I waited three weeks to use this hose and it lasted until today—so about 7 days where I maybe used it 5 of the 7 days. Turned the hose on today and water shot out of it everywhere. And apparently I have to keep it since I’m outside the return window. I bought two retractable hoses from Amazon and they both broke in weeks. At least Home Depot will take it back whenever it breaks. I usually only have to buy retractable hoses once a year. So I’d skip ordering it on Amazon since you’ll be stuck with it once it breaks (which will be in about one week).
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hose.
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered. Expanded exactly as advertised and is light weight when evacuated of water. Bought to replace good quality rubber hose. Need 100 feet worth to reach all areas. Had to cut rubber hose into 25 foot sections because too heavy to move the whole 100 feet at one time. Going to order another 50 foot and add quick disconnect. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Outer part of the hose started ripping the minute i started using it. Was not easy to move around at all. I followed filling directions closely but it just didn’t work like a regular rubber hose...
customer_reviews.author: NikkiD

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hose in July 2019. It worked well throughout the rest of the summer until it was stored through winter. Brought it out a couple weeks ago and after using a few times, the inner hose disconnected from the metal coupling (male cupeling) and no longer works. The rubber portion of the hose shrunk about 5 feet into the cloth portion of the hose. For being advertised as such a durable product I would have expected to get more than a few month use out of this hose. The hose is mainly used for watering plants and spraying off the patio. I do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kleckner

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one for the front yard and the second for use in my back garden, within weeks both hoses had sprung leaks, as if they were talking to each other lol "OK today let's both spring leeks and kink up".... More poorly made rubbish. Amazon why is the return process so time consuming, you're supposed to save us from that, not impressed with this product or Amazon's return of these hoses. Face it, this is a poorly made item, you might consider not carrying crap and focus on better quality for your Prime members.
customer_reviews.author: Tripolibaby

customer_reviews.title: We bought one to try and then placed orders to replace all our green patio and garden hoses.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced all of our traditional green garden hoses with these Gardguard hoses. They are lightweight, easy to use, easy to maneuver around the yard or patio, and super easy to drop on the ground or in a garden bowl after we're finished. You do need to allow a little time after turning off the water pressure to let the hose filter out and shrink up. They are durable and may need to be replaced over time, but they are affordable and the value is very good. We bought one initially and then placed an order for additional hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Boriero

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months :(
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few months ago and used it maybe 10 times or so. I always drained the water and hung it after each use. It was working perfectly until a few days ago that I turned on the water and noticed it’s been torn (or punctured) internally and it is leaking water. It’s completely useless now and I don’t know how that happened. Maybe too much contractions? I tried to contact customer service but found no contact information here on Amazon or on the web. No website no phone, nothing. It’s not a cheap item and I was expecting it last for at least a few years...
customer_reviews.author: azShopper

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one of these in October. By November it developed tiny holes and was spraying all over. I subsequently returned that one, thinking it was a fluke and exchanged it for another. Today, I was using it and the inside liner burst and became completely useless. I turned the valve to the sprayer off and I assume the pressure was the cause of its malfunction. The claim "never kink" is completely false. I do not understand how a hose can boast such great durability when I have gone through two in four months. Save yourself the trouble, this hose is a real POS.
customer_reviews.author: KS12

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Complete Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of a typical Pocket Hose based on reviews and to try to get more than 1 years worth of use out of the hose. Leaked badly at the junction of the coupling and the hose (not the faucet connection). This product is terrible and has a lot of plastic parts versus all metal for the most recent pocket hose. AVOID! I'd give negative stars if an option.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I want a 50 foot hose, not a 15 foot hose.
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that expandable means you get a 15' hose. I paid for a 50 foot hose, I expect to receive a 50 foot hose. I have a large lot and gardening area and this hose did not fit my needs. I do own a modern flexible hose that I recently bought from Walmart. I thought this hose was similar to that, but it's just a dinky little 15 foot hose. Perhaps it is my fault for not knowing how a expandable hose works, but as it is not clearly described or shown in the images or description, I felt cheated. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: StinkyPuppieReviews!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for three months. We dried it out and stored it in the garage during the winter. Pulled it out this week for the first time and it’s leaking everywhere. Also the spray head they include shot out water from every crevice. It’s also crap. Can’t find any info on a warranty. Likely some garbage Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The water hose is fine, but the head part was not working. I wanted to wash my car, but when I press it, water came out from cracks not from the actual holes. So basically I sprayed myself. I threw away a box and I cannot return. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I love it, BUT the connectors fail.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third hose of this type, flexable, easy to use & store. But everone of them failed at the connector. I brought it out again today after it was stored for 4 months. Opened the water value & I got a shower. Leaks bad at the water valve connector. They all do. At least I got one season out of it, from May to October. But $37 is a lot for a 6 month throw away.
customer_reviews.author: w2e3r4

customer_reviews.title: Completely disintegrated in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hose exactly 2 months ago. It worked awesome for the first 6 weeks or so. Then I started noticing puddles of water wherever the hose was. Then today the water pressure just stopped while we were trying to fill our inflatable pool. We heard the water running, so what gives? We lifted the hose up and the middle 2 feet of the thing was just dumping all the water out. Like it wasn’t one leak, the whole thing disintegrated. Complete POS. Pissed it’s too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Was great for three months, but c'mon, three months?!
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this hose when I bought it three months ago. Very lightweight, easy to move, takes up hardly any space, and the nozzle worked well. Was so happy I bought a 100' version for the front of the house. Today I go to use it. Hosing down a mat when all of a sudden the water flow drops. I look back and it is pouring out water from the body of the hose. So, now it's garbage. Did not keep under pressure (turned off water and held nozzle so it could drain), stored off to the side, almost always in shade. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Had holes
customer_reviews.text: Had three holes when i plugged it in to use it. Disappointing. It is very light weight and shrinks up after use. Going to try and return it and see if another one works better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I was optimistic about this hose considering the reviews. Used it for 3 weeks worked fine. Took it apart for winter and hung it up to dry out while it was still warm weather. Stored in a heat controlled garage. Took it out today to find it is spouting water through several points on this nozzle. Sad and disappointed. Waste of money considering I took care of those hose and nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Finally leaked
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hose for about 8 months. I would expect it to last much longer. Yesterday, I found 2 leaks in the hose. Kind of odd it happened roughly at the same time. The spray nozzle looks nice, but it is cheaply made. I commonly take it on and off and if any water it left inside it rusts. So prior to spraying anything with it, I always have to push water through the nozzle for about 5 to 10 secs until it is clear/clean again. I like the idea of this hose as it does collapse quite well. However, I would not recommend this brand. Get something that has a stronger warranty behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Snorydr

customer_reviews.title: Hose sprung leak after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Had the hose for 2 months and it sprung a leak. Picture attached. Not sure if I just happened to get a bad one, or if they are all this bad. Return window closed after 1 month per Amazon site, but hoping company still let me return it for another one. I am willing to give it one more try.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Kalla

customer_reviews.title: A short life ,expensive for 3 months use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hose 7-2019 and used 3 months then drained and hung up in basement for winter ,I got out and connected and used to wash off deck . I went out a couple of days later and when turned on was leaking near connection to faucet . I cannot recommend this to anyone ,itried to find out how to return under warranty but can find no address or where to contact . Cannot even get an answer from amazon on this matter,have sent e-mails but no answer from anyone .
customer_reviews.author: philip gregg

customer_reviews.title: Pin holes after a month
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this hose when it first arrived, but after just a month of use (always emptied and hung up), it developed it's first pin hole. Though this wasn't my first choice in hoses, reviews convinced me to purchase and give it a try. I should have gone with my gut on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andalusian W.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work - do not believe good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This hose didn’t last one month. The water pressure that came out of the sprayer was never enough to actually achieve the “setting” (aka cone, mist, shower). It never maintained enough pressure for us to water our three plants and we had to revert back to just filling up a watering can and doing it that way. Do not believe the 5-star reviews, as I received a letter in the mail asking me to leave a 5-star review for a gift card. No thank you. You’re better off finding a hose at a reputable Garden Center that won’t buy your reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Love! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I would normally go to a hardware store to get a hose. But with covid-19 I decided to order one off Amazon. I'm glad I did! The hose came today. It came on its own storage bag. I hooked it up and used it right away. It works great! I used it to water my grass. And clean my car mats. It comes with an attachable spray nozzle that has lots of different spray modes. The hose is a lot shorter when no water is in it and becomes 50 feet when it has water pressure. Definitely loved the hose! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MichellePire

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after one year
customer_reviews.text: Pros: lightweight and stretchable. The nozzle has multiple patterns. I use it to wash my car and it serves the purpose. Cons: The end connecting to the faucet is leaking now after about a year. No matter how tight I turn the thread, water is leaking out from the connector. it's still usable, but nonetheless disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SerenaSheri

customer_reviews.title: Must have hose
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of lugging around our old hose, so I started looking at these types. This hose is built well and easy to carry around. One of my other favorite features is the turn off switch at the user end, as this makes it easy to turn off when you don’t need water without running back the faucet. The turn off switch also makes it easy to swap attachments since kinking this type of hose would be hard. This hose also came with a sprayer that works very well and has a good variety of spray types. Definitely would recommend this hose.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Contracting problem.
customer_reviews.text: I run a dog boarding business and I use this type of hose inside our building because they are so much easier to use in tight places. This hose doesn’t collect dog hair like some I have used. That’s a plus for me. But, I am very disappointed in this hose because even though it has only been in use for about a month it has already stopped contracting in places. We never let these hoses stay under pressure unless we are using them so I can only attribute this to poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this is a great hose! And I'm not the kind of guy who writes reviews. This thing is so light weight and "compact" and then it fills with water and it's almost like a snake wriggling around, it's so cool as it fills up with water and expands and then shrinks when you turn it off. Highly recommend. Replace your old clunky, heavy and "kinky" hose with this one.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hose
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got the water leaked from the plastic part, just below the brass connection. I believe the one I got was that one of a kind lemon that just happens as this hose gets great reviews. The seller was great and immediately sent me a replacement hose. No leakage with the new one and this one is awesome. I see now why this hose gets great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not that durable but replacement has design change-may fix problem
customer_reviews.text: The hose ripped in less than a year-it rubs against the sleeve at the top where attaches to faucet. I ordered a replacement but will look for a better one if same thing happens. The new one has a different design where the problem occurred and looks like not as sharp where ribs. May go to regular hose but have one located right next to this one-is nice to have a lightweight hose like this for watering flowers,etc. I. The summer...my other one is wide and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: LuvAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I had my lawn aerated and seeded and have to water it daily for a few weeks. I got a 50 foot hose and at first thought I needed to get a longer hose but it really does stretch! I love how lightweight this hose is too! I can water my lawn from one side to the other very easily now. It came with a hose holder and the nozzle. The nozzle has a lot of different settings so you can choose how you want the spray to be. Overall I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wescott

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and lightweight to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my expandable hose as it is so much more manageable than the old heavy hose on a rind up wheel. I love the hangar that goes over the faucet and I no longer have the hose reel cluttering my deck or leaking everywhere. It's so easy to drain and hang up after each use that I actually do that! With the heavy traditional hose which would kink and be a pain to wind up I would leave it strewn on the porch for me to trip over. I loved this so much that I bought a 75ft and 100 ft expandable hoses which have revolutionized watering my porch, deck and yard. I've used for a month and delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I've used this hose only a handful of times. It was great for the first 5 times I used it. The 6th time my wife noticed there was a small hole causing water to leak in the middle. The 7th and last time the inner tube busted at a different point and now the hose is unusable. I'm completely disgusted at the price I paid for this and how long it lasted. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: 50' long when you want it, shrinks to nothing when you don't.
customer_reviews.text: This gardGuard 50' hose is so fantastic we ordered another one. There's plenty of pressure. Not as much volume as our 3⁄4 rubber hose, but all we do is hand watering of potted plants and it's more than adequate. When not in use we tuck it into a 14 inch clay pot. A word of warning: don't pressurise it while in the pot. It's really hard on frogs who reside there!. I wouldn't drive my car over it, but it's great for washing the car. Don't yank on it if it's tangled on some obstacle. Treat it with respect and it should last several years. We're on our second year and it still seems new.
customer_reviews.author: ScooterRay

customer_reviews.title: No other for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight of the hose with the brass fittings. The multi spray head is great for watering and misting my plants. Hose expands and contracts back to the contracted size quickly and is easy to store especially with the hose caddy that came with the hose. Will purchase again when my old and less quality hoses need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Mush-Moto

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my boat on its trailer and it's turned out great. The hose is fabric wrapped so it doesn't leave rub marks on the boat. It's very light and flexible, so it's easy pull all around and under and over the trailer, boat and top. The nozzle has all the settings you want from a jet to a mist. Big bonus is the valve next to the male threads. It allows me to turn off the water at the hose end, and attach it to my engine to flush it, and then turn the water back on. Saves me some steps from the boat to the faucet and back. Great product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product, but quality could be better at that price
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty average quality. While the seller advertises brass fittings, the brass is very thin. In fact, I had to look closely to see if it was plastic or not. Other than that, it seems to be a well-made hose; much better than those cheaper ones that have plastic at both ends. Time will tell if it holds up better than the less-expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Don Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Sweet.  No more lugging a heavy hose.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that are sooooo cool. I loved that it was so light.........even with water in in. Brass fittings were excellent. I must admit, I believe the 'soft spot' on this hose will be the connection where the hose connects to the brass fitting. It is gong to burst - just a question of how long it will take. That is my only 'con' on this product. I'd suggest some duct tape at the connection - just in case. Storage is great. No kinking - ha! I will be buying another for my back yard. Just not sure if 50 feet is enough. May have to go 100.
customer_reviews.author: J-Alan

customer_reviews.title: No more kinks and fighting wind up! Perfect for small watering jobs!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hose for 5 months now and no issues. When you have a Ranch you need hoses everywhere these are perfect. I use these at my barn for three separate water areas, nothing worse than a linked hose when you’re trying to fill water buckets in a timely manner without getting frustrated walking back to the area where the hose has a kink. Well no more, all the hoses I purchased took the issue of kinked hoses away!!!! I love these, they take up little space and I don’t have to play the wind up game anymore. So frustrating when previous hoses would never lay correctly. These are great for small watering jobs!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: 5/10. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 8/27/2020: This hose was everything until I had to have one replaced because it was leaking. Now both the replacement and the additional 100ft hose I bought are busted. Great idea, poor execution. Original: This hose is literally the coolest thing ever. Watching it expand is mesmerizing. The hook and the handle it came with are terrific as well! I originally bought the 50ft hose and it leaked. Customer service was amazing and they sent me another. Love this product so much I bought an additional 100ft one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCarty

customer_reviews.title: The Stretch makes it shorter than 50ft.
customer_reviews.text: So I thought 50 feet would be enough to go from one side of my garage to the other - but because of the stretch it doesn't get as far as I need. It only stretches to about 30ft and then I feel like I have to really pull on it to get it to go further. I would advise someone that needs it to actually go 50ft to get the 100ft one instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. Uno

customer_reviews.title: Works to perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as advertised! It was actually a little weird to see this thing grow, but once the water is following it grows my itself and then when you turn it off and continue to spray the water, it shrinks all by itself. It's pretty amazing. All of the function settings for different sprays worked well too. I think this was a great buy for first first house purchase was a new home owner. Might have to buy another for the back yard too
customer_reviews.author: Truth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it until the inner tubing popped
customer_reviews.text: So I loved loved loved this, the company even replaced the first one that popped. Then the second one popped. I really would love to have another one I am just scared to re-buy and it leaks again. Maybe inner tubing could be thicker to keep from rupturing then it would be perfect. I had to go out and buy some regular hoses from dept store and I hate them. They are builky, they kink, I want this one back just don't want it to pop again. Seller maybe you could help?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Maddox

customer_reviews.title: So Manageable
customer_reviews.text: This hose is, so far, the best hose ever. I've used the lightweight hoses that break so easily. And the big heavy hoses that are durable but too heavy for me to maneuver. This hose has the best of all worlds. The brass fittings make it easy to hook up to the spigot and don't leak. The hose is light and easy to pick up and move but the outside of the hose is durable. I haven't had it very long but so far I love it and if it holds up the way I feel it will, I'm going to get a 100' one for the front of my house.
customer_reviews.author: BB67

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water hose so far. I can’t believe I have wasted so many years lugging a big heavy lifetime warranty hose. (Not sure whose lifetime but it has been we have repaired it a couple of times.) Finally I can conceal this hose behind a plant in my courtyard and never worry about tripping over it again. I like it so much that if it doesn’t last a lifetime, I will still be happy. One thing to get used to is how much water remains in the hose after turning the faucet off. Just remember that and save a few plants to water.
customer_reviews.author: Gmafaye

customer_reviews.title: Company Backs Their Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice hose; the nozzle and the hanger are great. The true test of a company is when something goes wrong. In late June 2020, just before the one year point, the hose developed some small holes a few inches below the brass connector which caused it to spray out when using. I contacted the company, they replied within a day, asking for pictures. They very graciously sent a completely new unit. I’m very happy with this product and the company, and recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Gardyloo

customer_reviews.title: Great hose but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool hose and I bought two of them about a year ago. But one just broke on me today and it seems like the inner tube or whatever popped so the hose is now completely useless. Great hOse but seems like they’re not very durable. Maybe I got unlucky. I also bought a Similar hose from a different brand a year ago, so that’s three total. And that one actually broke too. Same style and probably the same manufacture out of China.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and more!
customer_reviews.text: This came just 24hrs after ordering... great timing for when my previous hose broke yesterday morning. Everything came in a bag AND box, very nicely organized. The hose filled and emptied quickly and seems to be of a great material... best part - THREE other hoses have leaked on this particular spout but this one fits perfectly without any alterations or additions. The sprayer reaches well over 30’ on the “jet” setting and even has a “soaker” setting for my more vulnerable seedlings and plants. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be the best bang for the buck on amazon. The fittings are made of metal and seems like it will last. The sprayer has many settings and seems to be of adequate quality for the price. The true test will be of the hose itself. The last flexible hose I had bought from a big box store gave up when the outer covering degraded from the usual wear and tear from dragging the hose on the ground and exposed the inner flexible pipe. Pretty happy with it so far as it looks to be made of decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: I. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Too high maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this hose has to be stored away after use when I bought it. I like to be able to leave my hoses out when I use them a lot in the summer months so after a few weeks of putting this away after use, I started leaving it out where it was exposed to mulch and my driveway (cement) and of course rain. It was not used a lot or heavily, but nonetheless it quickly developed leaks presumably from rubbing on the cement and mulch when I used it. It’s fine if you want to baby a hose....but who wants to baby a hose??!
customer_reviews.author: Fara

customer_reviews.title: Leaks under any pressure!
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this but it leaks once the water is turned off. The pressure is way too much for the plastic pieces to handle and it just leaks like crazy even when it’s barely turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Handy little hose!
customer_reviews.text: I am very fond of this hose. I used it to replace a 25 foot standard hose that I would fight with just to water a few plants. This hose is super easy to use. It’s light and stores away easily. I love how it shrinks back down after use. The one possible con is that if you were to have it stretched to maximum length and start spraying the relief in pressure does cause it to shrink back down a bit. It is longer than I need so I don’t foresee this ever being an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Read this...
customer_reviews.text: One month in and the sprayer that came with it decided to get stupid. Ugh. Haven’t found a sprayer yet that works beyond 1 year. Also, the gold lever just below the sprayer broke off without any real reason to do so. Shanty construction. Wish folks could just be honest in their item descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical as my experience flex hoses is they're junk. This one has held up much more than the days or hours others have lasted. Seems durable and handles pressure well. Works much better in the garden than a standard hose which can be a pain keeping off plants while watering. The reason I was interested in this type hose and was willing to give one another try.******* Now it's been in use daily since the end of May and it's now less than a week till September and it performs as it did when it arrived. Water pressure at the house has the ability to destroy some conventional hoses in a summer so I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight hose that wraps easily to side of house (and looks good there!). Takes up little room and easy to uncoil and then recoil. Great for those with small children who can't handle clunky heavy hoses. This one is easy to move around and doesn't kink. Looking forward to see how it lasts through the season with durability but I don't foresee any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & price, getting another one for my front yard!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbor had a standard 10 foot garden hose that we used for watering garden and washing cars and we would have to turn cars around to do both sides. This stretch hose takes up half the room on the Spicket and stretches twice the length. Does not need to be retracted as soon as the water is turned off it does it all by itself and quickly. The nozzle is a little cheesy possibly upgrade to a better one but still gets the job done satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: GI JOEY

customer_reviews.title: Great value, lightweight hose, quality sprayer head
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hose. It is light and easy to move around the yard. The included sprayer head is of good quality and has many different settings, including a shower setting, which is great for watering my garden, and a "jet" setting which is great for hosing down the patio. The 50' length of the hose is great because it will stretch all the way across my property and I haven't had any issues with tangling. The hose was a decent price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I needed a convenient hose for the plants on my deck. I can't yet comment on the durability as I've just received the hose, but it's going to be very convenient if it works well. It has a shut off valve right at the nozzle - great for moving from one area to the next. I like that it has brass connectors rather than plastic. It came with a great spray nozzle attachment, and a device to hang the hose on when not in use. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Devil in a Blue Dress

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than year - no warrant after
customer_reviews.text: Hose broke after mild use in less than a year. Was even put away inside all winter so hardly was used more than 4-5 months. I purchased two and they both met the same demise! I would strongly consider purchasing elsewhere as the description of the durability of this item is not accurate. Warranty is only for one year so if little benefit considering hoses should last longer. Description states service life of Hose is over 1500 uses - with DAILY use that’s over 4 years. With use in the summer only that’s 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Stars67

customer_reviews.title: Sprung a leak just shy of 6mo use, still recommend
customer_reviews.text: The 100ft hose sprung a leak about 3 inches from hose connector just shy of 6mo from date of purchase. At its price wish it had lasted longer though much sturdier than the similarly lightweight pocket hose. Ordered again in a shorter length. Still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very user friendly Hose
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderfully lightweight and doesn't kink like so many others. These are the two features which sold me on the product. It is esthetically pleasing as well which got my attention. The nozzle seems durable and is easy to use. The washers that are included make the set-up pretty leak proof at the spigot. It is perfect for my needs. As I have not had it long enough yet, I can't attest to its durability but will come back in a few months to add that to my review.
customer_reviews.author: Eunephron

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle for this hose should not be part of the product line. You sell a superior hose with a inferior nozzle. The handle that pushes to the body has a plastic nut that is extremely weak. If you look at hose nozzles from other companies they have a metal nut to adjust the spray level, not plastic. It lasted till the 3rd time of use..
customer_reviews.author: Ray Mok

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hose and great accessories
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hose for easy storage and full reach. Very light weight and shrinks down really small to fit in a nice bag and store anywhere. The sprayer is really nice as well and works great. The settings are excellent and it is comfortable to handle. I love that it came with a handy hook to hang the hose on the spigot too. Really easy way to store it when not in use without having to buy one and drill into the bricks or the deck.
customer_reviews.author: cxen

customer_reviews.title: Hose Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Hose leaks at the joint where the hose connects to the faucet when any sort of tension is applied. The leak is on the hose side of the connection not the connector side, such that it cannot be corrected with a rubber grommet. The nozzle is made of cheap plastic with a less than desirable pressure output.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best expandable hose I have found !
customer_reviews.text: I take care of all plants in our home.... I've bought and tried many of these types of hoses because I drag them into the house to water back decks on the back and front decks too. I also water the indoor plants with the hose. It is hooked to the laundry sink in the garage. The fitting is strong, does not leak, the hose is made to it is protected from spitting by getting a gentle snag on something. I LOVE this hose... although a tiny bit heavier, it is still just amazing !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Solid brass?
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked this hose. However after only a month of use, I went to detach it from the faucet and found the hose had already corroded on the threads. I needed to use pliers to remove the hose from the spigot. Now screwing the hose on or removing it is extremely difficult. I have a 5 year old basic hose from a home improvement store that still goes on and off easily. If the connections were indeed "solid brass" they would not have corroded so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Hose has multiple leaks after just one year.
customer_reviews.text: The hose developed multiple leaks exactly one year after purchase. I had expected such an expensive hose would at least last longer than that. I've never had good luck with these types of hoses because they always spring leaks. There seems to be no difference from the $5 hose. And of course, I can't get my $44 dollars back. I don't advise buying this type of hose. I won't ever buy one again! They are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lou

customer_reviews.title: As described and initially quality seems good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The hose is as described. Initial quality seems good, although I would not know long-term quality and the company offers incentives to review product through a free gift, so I doubt many of the reviews are long-term quality reviews. I would have to agree with other reviews stating that the hose may not actually be 50 ft long , but I did not get out it. Overall, seems like a good product for the price and definitely fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Scrub

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my hose about 4 months now...it seemed to be holding up nicely, until I went out the other day to water my plants. I found there was water spraying from a small hole in the hose and the sprayer! Very disappointed, because I was happy with it until now, it's been outside in full sun and I just use it at least 4x per week to water plants and spray down outdoor furniture. It still looks new, I like the plastic hangar that came with it, but very disappointed it has holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little hose and attachments
customer_reviews.text: My prior expandable hose needed replaced and surprisingly this one provided quite a bit more water pressure out of it. The attachments that it came with, especially the nozzle, make this a great value. I'll be purchasing another one for a different part of the house. Haven't used it a whole lot yet but the construction and durability seem to be really good quality. No leaks at the bib or attachment.
customer_reviews.author: The BRD

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These stretch hoses are very convenient but it's important to know that if you buy the cheap versions, you will most definitely get what you pay for - Crap! They leak, they break. The cheap versions are a waste of your money. The GardGuard stretch hose is a bit expensive but they are quality made and do not leak and it's looking like we'll get a lot of years of service out of them. I recommend the GardGuard brand.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeethecat

customer_reviews.title: I love how light and un-bulky it is
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand regular hoses...they kink, they are heavy, they are a pain to store. This hose is so light and so easy to store and move around. When there's no water in it, it's very small. I will say, I bought the 50 foot and I probably should have bought the 100 foot. Since the hose expands when water is going through it, as soon as I turn the sprayer on, the house starts to retract. It might have something to do with the water pressure at my house but next time I would definitely get the 100 foot option.
customer_reviews.author: Mom You Can Trust

customer_reviews.title: IT'S BEEN PERFECT FOR US
customer_reviews.text: We've used a variety of expandable garden hoses that are convenient but seem to inevitably fail. The warrantees have been good and we get another without charge but know that it will be doomed. Having said that , Gardguard seems much better made than the other ones and it also collapses to a more convenient shape than the other ones did. It's been a single season but we are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lutwin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad with great flexibility
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the hose but have always wondered how long they would last depending on the conditions. So far not bad but I have noticed significant moisture on the outside of the hose (on cool and warm days). The fitting attached to the house no longer makes a tight connection- that being said, I have not checked the o-ring to see if it needs to be changed. included spray nozzle and the additional shutoff at the end are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky 07

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, lightweight, good color, works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I've owned on of those cheap water hoses that everyone has, the hard rubber ones that are heavy and such an eyesore. Well, I was hesitant to buy this product just because I was skeptical of how well and how long it'll last. It was an easy installation, worked like a dream, turned on the water and the nozzle worked well. I just know that this product is going to make my life so much easier to tend to my little garden plus it's lightweight. I'm excited to use it and observe how well it does. I'll be sure to come back to review it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pa Lo

customer_reviews.title: How to get cust srvc for 100% satisfaction guarantee is impossible
customer_reviews.text: It broke at the spigot. The real issue is that the description says 100% satisfaction and to contact them. There is no them that I can find. I’m going straight to amazon. These hoses aren’t the best... but convenient and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Rainee

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised. Compact, stretches, hard to kink
customer_reviews.text: Works just great for my purpose: Limited use to feed water to a power washer. I like that it rolls up very compactly after you finish using it and remove it from the faucet and power washer; I like that it has a carry case. It stretches nicely when you turn the water on (I'm not convinced it's 50 feet, but it's long enough for me). Unlike traditional garden hoses, it is very hard to "kink."
customer_reviews.author: Hy D. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered two more!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is so much easier to use than even my lightest conventional hose I've just ordered two more for my other hose stations. The hose provides a good amount of flow and just about self-stores when it is shut off and vented. I can't speak to durability since I've only had the hose a short time but the brass fittings are heavy and seem to be high quality. The nozzle works very well with more settings than I'll likely ever use
customer_reviews.author: Cat Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all purpose hose that can do anything and everything
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this hose. It's amazing how many different nozzle settings there are. The length is great to reach anything I need to which is mainly my flowers. Love how it expands and contracts. So cool and never Tangled. My kids even love watering flowers now!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Elevates your gardening experience
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated maneuvering a bulky hose around obstacles in our yard, and probably worse, hated the dance of coiling it properly once done. This hose makes all those issues pretty much disappear. It's really light, nimble, and once it's filled with water, does this amazing expansion but is still much lighter than conventional hoses. The hand sprayer control is well designed. The one issue I see is at the hose-to brass fitting connection at the hose bib. This is the stress point of what's a fairly delicate product. I predict failure there though so far (2 months) no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sparks

customer_reviews.title: I love this hose and it is still working fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose last summer and I have had no problems with it so far. I leave it out in the summer but keep it stored inside in the winter. I make sure to turn off and empty out the hose when not using it just in case. I don’t miss the big rubber hose at all. I also bought a shorter one of these for the front yard and that one has held up great too. This is the first type of expandable hose that didn’t break with minimal use. I would buy another one and this is an honest non-sponsored review.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Utopia

customer_reviews.title: First time buying an expanding hose.
customer_reviews.text: The hose has exceeded my expectations. Not only is it easy to store (with the included hose hanger) but it is incredibly light weight. No more need to lug a heavy hose around. It is actually mesmerizing to watch the hose work, when filling with water or draining the hose. This is my first time buying this type of hose and now I want to get rid of my leaky, large, reel system and replace it with a few of these.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased a second one!
customer_reviews.text: So I had this beast of a hose in the backyard. You know the type - made of thick rubber that won't go back into a neat coil no matter what and leaks from every nozzle attached to it. I hated fighting with that thing and replaced it with this set. What a difference!! This hose doesn't fight with me at all. The nozzle has a bunch of different spray patterns and doesn't leak! The holder is handy, and it's fun to watch the hose shrink back down. I just purchased another one to go out front.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi E

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: We used this hose very lightly, as in once every week or two and it still didn't even last six months. It leaks from the top of the hose where it connects to the hose bib connector. Can't find any way to warranty it - the link on this description says to contact the manufacturer and a Google search didn't return an obvious company called Gardguard. Hoping someone may run customer service via reviews and help me out - I was expecting much more from this hose given the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: cmkj

customer_reviews.title: Small when not in use
customer_reviews.text: I like how small and light the hose is when not in use. The pot in the pic is about 12" high. I pull the hose out to use it, then, after turning off the faucet and leaving the sprayer held open for a few seconds it shrinks up and is easily stuffed back into the pot. I like the sprayer that came with it too. I haven't had it long enough to rate durability, but it seems well made. If I need another hose I'll definitely consider another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: GregG

customer_reviews.title: Works well and it seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hose for several weeks now and I am very happy with it. I've had a couple of the (not so) cheap expanding hoses from TV fame for some time. I have always felt that they were somewhat fragile and they've always leaked a little bit. When they go though, they go immediately and of course there is no fixing them. The outer covering on this one seems very durable. My wife uses it in her garden. She has it permanently hooked up to the water bib and drags it across gravel and dirt etc without thinking about it. So far no leaks and the covering seems to holding up just fine in the Florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This house served its purpose very well the 1st year. It was exactly what I wanted. But when I hooked it up the 2nd year, the inner lining had obviously sprung a leak and it no longer worked. I expected it to last longer than one summer.
customer_reviews.author: Creative-Culinary Food and Cocktail Blog

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this hose.! Though it stretches, it seems strong and durable. Used it now several times because I received it recently. II like it so much, I just purchased the 100ft as well for my back yard. Current hose is a stretch but it’s leaky and I ger soaked just watering my plants. Hope this one does better,..we’ll see. It was packaged well and received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mt. GalAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool hose!
customer_reviews.text: So far this hose is super cool! I love how it shrinks back up which makes it a lot easier to put into a container (I use an empty ceramic flower pot)and cover it. I live in Los Angeles and the sun destroys hoses if you leave them out on the sun. It seems a lot more durable than some of the similar hoses I have bought, but only time can tell about that. So far I love it so much I am getting two more! That pretty much says it all in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Lunaloba

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: I like it very easy to move around, I have 2 50ft hoses connected, one problem is that when you stretch it out pretty far, hose becomes smaller in diameter and so less water. The only other problem was where the two hoses are attached, the brass turn off fell off, not a big thing, cause I don’t use it, would be nice to connect two hoses without that shut off valve.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a defect
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this hose except when I took it out of the box I immediately noticed a defect on the outside covering. I'm hoping it doesn't cause a problem in the future. I use it for watering plants on my deck which has a very smooth surface but it still concerns me that this defect may cause it to fail. I've use it twice so far and it does everything as advertized. Very fast length expansion and contraction. Would have given it 5 stars if it didn't have a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This set comes with everything you need to kick off your spring /summer.
customer_reviews.text: Last weekend we moved into our seasonal camping spot for the first time. We were at a different location last year. I bought this hose to have set up on our site so not only will our camper have running water but we will also have a hose available for anything that needs rinsing. This 50ft hose is working out perfect. I couldnt believe how it basically doubled if not more, in size when I hooked it up and turned the water on. I was able to use the hose holder and coil it up neatly. Really nice product it is lightweight but not cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write a review so I could have a chance to really use the hose. I like the fact it was not heavy and easy to handle. It expanded and shrunk quickly. I especially like the valve on the nozzle that allowed to turn off and on the flow without going back to the faucet. It looks like it is well made and will last, but it is too soon for me to give it more than four stars for durability. Bottom line I really like this hose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cold Weather Application
customer_reviews.text: Moved to cold weather climate and old hot weather hoses were horribly stiff and inflexible. I decided to try this and the weather doesn't affect it at all. Now, I haven't had to use it yet, but it's been in the garage for weeks and just yesterday I moved it and was pleased how easy it was to handle. Cold weather had no effect on this hose in terms of hardness. Love how easy it is to store in small places.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and flexible
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I purchased a hose of this type of design as I have only seen the commercials on television for similar types, but never purchased one. Product was easy to unpack (nice job with the polyester storage bag/pouch) and it was very easy to attach to the nozzle on the spigot. Water flowed easily through the attached handle/nozzle/watering device and it was easy to drain all water out once water was turned off. Easy dry and quick to store in the bag. Since it is fall I will store this way but looking to probably buy one for the back yard in the Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking hose and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a better quality hose over other brands I have purchased before. Its definitely light weight and came with a part you can hang on a wall to drape the hose over, although I have not done that yet, and nice little black bag to keep the accessories in so you dont lose them. Since I just got it, I can't say how long it will last, but I hope it last much longer than those other brands that only last a few months before coming apart and springing leaks.
customer_reviews.author: KatzMeow

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite hose!
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of people, I had the old-style green hoses and the rotary coil-up holders and I HATED them! Heavy, awkward, kinking, hose would get tangled up on the holder. Just a waking nightmare. This new hose is so much better! It is light, stays out of the way when you're not using it, stretches instead of kinking or bending. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McGowan

product_meta.title: Gardguard 50ft Expandable Garden Hose: Water Hose with 9 Function Nozzle and Durable 3-Layers Latex, Flexible Water Hose with Solid Brass Fittings, Best Choice for Watering and Washing
product_meta.description:
Size:50ft| Color:Black-blue

❤Gardguard garden hose is the best choice for your everyday use.

❤Garden water hose is necessary item for a family live in a house with a garden/yard.

❤Now try our garden water hose.

❤9 kind of type can be changed to use in different ways: car washing, house, pool or floor cleaning, garden watering, lawn or yard maintenance, also having fun and a shower for your beloved pets in hot days!



SPECIFICATION

Color: black-blue

Inner Hose: Double layer latex

Outer Material: 3300D polyester fabric

Connector Material: Solid brass

Diameter of the valve: 3/4 inch

9 Pattern Nozzle: shower, flat, full, soaker, center, mist, angle, jet, cone

Lowest Working Temperature: -4℉(-20℃)

Highest Working Temperature: 122℉(50℃)

Package: Nozzle /connectors/ pack



Warm Tips:

1.Extend the water hose totally, do not let the hose knotted.

2.Best working under water pressure range 0.2-0.6MPa.

3.Adjust the nozzle to avoid leaking.

4.Do NOT let the hose rub against the ground frequently.

5.Completely drain water from hose and hang up it when not in use.

6.Store the hose in cool and ventilative place.
feature_bullets: 【9 FUNCTIONAL SAFETY NOZZLE】: Compared to most 8 pattern hose nozzle, our water nozzle with 9 pattern for more choices. The rubberized outer coating is non-slip and comfortable. Rotating bezel for easy choosing kind of nozzle. Buckle stent for uninterrupted use. Ergonomic handgrip for effortless operation. You can feel the quality the instant you pick up the 50 Ft flexible and expandable garden hose. Not for use with Drinking Water, Not Potable.

【HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS GARDEN HOSE】: The flexible expanding water hose uses a high-density double-layer latex core and a powerful 3750D polyester fabric cover to prevent breakage and leakage. It can withstand water pressure 3-12 Bar and temperature 41℉-113℉. This flexible garden hose for long-term use. You don't have to worry about the water pipes being broken by the pressure of the water even in winter.

【SOLID 3/4IN BRASS CONNECTORS】: The 50ft hose comes with solid 3/4 inches brass connectors, they will not rust, leak or crack, and this garden hose design for long-term use. With the correct adapter you can hook it up to your kitchen faucet. If your kitchen faucet has a thread size of 3/4 inches, you can connect the hose without additional adapters.

【INCREDIBLE EXPANDING DESIGN】: Our garden hose flexible expands from 17 feet to 50 feet length. This garden hose can expand 3 times to its original hose length when water pressure is on, and shrinks to original pipe length in minutes when it’s off. 50ft long can cover your whole garden, you can make the watering simple and efficient. We will send you a pocket to store it. Just drain water from the hose when not in use, put in the bag and store it in a cool and dry place.

【WIDE APPLICATIONS AND 100% SATISFACTORY】: Perfect for many applications including house/car/floor/yard washing, garden watering, pet cleaning, having fun or business use. Please check the garden hose carefully before use. If you find any problems during the use, please contact us as soon as possible, we will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,530 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
